EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-SBC for E Nurture-T001ZO.Email 6 Consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: The key to protecting your IP communications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Protect your borders in a world of growing connections The session border controller (SBC) plays a critical role in enterprise networks that rely on IP voice and video. It’s the SBC’s job to protect and sustain quality while securing the media and signaling streams that cross network edges and deliver business communications services.
It’s a tough job that’s only going to get tougher with the growing number of connected devices, web-based portals and digital transformation initiatives. How can you continue to deliver quality services while ensuring your network is secure at its borders?
The Nokia SBC solution holds the key. Learn about deployment options and the five benefits you’ll realize from chosing the field-proven virtualized and cloud-ready Nokia SBC. Enjoy! {{my.Email Signature Person}} {{my.Email Signature Title}}, Nokia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
